field.name: a_minor
field.documentation: Minor radius of the plasma boundary [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: elongation
field.documentation: Elongation of the plasma boundary; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: elong_upper
field.documentation: Elongation upper of the plasma boundary; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: elong_lower
field.documentation: Elongation lower of the plasma boundary; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: tria_upper
field.documentation: Upper triangularity of the plasma boundary; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: tria_lower
field.documentation: Lower triangularity of the plasma boundary; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: xpts
field.documentation: Position of the Xpoints, first is the active xpoint if diverted [m]; This is formally declared as an array of structure to allow for time-dependent size of the R and Z vectors in the sub-structure below. However, xpts must be allocated to size 1. Time-dependent;

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]. Vector(npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]. Vector(npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: left_low_st
field.documentation: Position of the lower left strike point [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: right_low_st
field.documentation: Position of the lower right strike point [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: left_up_st
field.documentation: Position of the upper left strike point [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: right_up_st
field.documentation: Position of the upper right strike point [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: active_limit
field.documentation: Position of the active limiter point (point of the plasma boundary in contact with the limiter) [m]; Set R = 0 for X-point plasma; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: ang_lcms_upo
field.documentation: Angle at the LMCS X point upper outer; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: ang_lcms_upi
field.documentation: Angle at the LMCS X point upper inner; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: ang_lcms_lwo
field.documentation: Angle at the LMCS X point lower outer; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: ang_lcms_lwi
field.documentation: Angle at the LMCS X point lower inner; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: flush
field.documentation: FLUSH package coefficients for the mapping of the equlibrium. The time grid of this structure is the same as the equilibrium structure above.

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: position
field.documentation: Major radius and altitude of the FLUSH grid [m]; Time-dependent; Vectors resp. (nR) and (nZ)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: coef
field.documentation: Coefficients of the fit; Time-dependent; Matrix 2D (nR,nZ)

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: global_param
field.documentation: 0d output parameters

field.name: beta_pol
field.documentation: poloidal beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: beta_tor
field.documentation: toroidal beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: beta_normal
field.documentation: normalised beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: i_plasma
field.documentation: total toroidal plasma current [A]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: li
field.documentation: internal inductance; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: volume
field.documentation: total plasma volume [m^3]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: area
field.documentation: area poloidal cross section [m^2]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: psi_ax
field.documentation: poloidal flux at the magnetic axis [Wb]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: psi_bound
field.documentation: poloidal flux at the selected plasma boundary (separatrix for a free boundary code; fixed boundary for fixed boundary code) [Wb]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: mag_axis
field.documentation: Magnetic axis values

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position of the magnetic axis [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar;

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: bphi
field.documentation: Total toroidal magnetic field at the magnetic axis [T]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: q
field.documentation: q at the magnetic axis; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: q_95
field.documentation: q at the 95% poloidal flux surface; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: q_min
field.documentation: minimum q value in the plasma; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field, redundant with the toroidfield CPO, to be used by the ETS

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Scalar. Time-dependent.

field.name: w_mhd
field.documentation: Plasma energy content = 3/2 * int(p,dV) with p being the total pressure (thermal + fast particles) [J]. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: gamma
field.documentation: Adiabatic index. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: profiles_1d
field.documentation: output profiles as a function of the poloidal flux

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal flux [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: toroidal flux [Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pressure
field.documentation: pressure profile as a function of the poloidal flux [Pa]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: F_dia
field.documentation: diamagnetic profile (R B_phi) [T m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pprime
field.documentation: psi derivative of the pressure profile [Pa/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: ffprime
field.documentation: psi derivative of F_dia multiplied with F_dia [T^2 m^2/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: jphi
field.documentation: flux surface averaged toroidal current density = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: jparallel
field.documentation: flux surface averaged parallel current density = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 = equilibrium/global_param/toroid_field/b0 ; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: q
field.documentation: Safety factor = dphi/dpsi [-]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: shear
field.documentation: Magnetic shear, defined as rho_tor/q*dq/drho_tor [-]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: r_inboard
field.documentation: radial coordinate (major radius) at the height and on the left of the magnetic axis [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: r_outboard
field.documentation: radial coordinate (major radius) at the height and on the right of the magnetic axis [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate [m], to be used by the ETS and in many CPOs (coreprof, ...). Defined as sqrt(phi/pi/B0), where B0 = equilibrium/global_param/toroid_field/b0. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: dpsidrho_tor
field.documentation: dpsi/drho_tor [Wb/m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_vol
field.documentation: Normalised radial coordinate related to the plasma volume. Defined as sqrt(volume / volume[LCFS]). Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: beta_pol
field.documentation: poloidal beta (inside the magnetic surface); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: li
field.documentation: internal inductance (inside the magnetic surface); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: elongation
field.documentation: Elongation; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: tria_upper
field.documentation: Upper triangularity profile; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: tria_lower
field.documentation: Lower triangularity profile; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: volume
field.documentation: Volume enclosed in the flux surface [m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: vprime
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the volume enclosed in the flux surface with respect to psi, i.e. dV/dpsi [m^3/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: dvdrho
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the volume enclosed in the flux surface with respect to rho_tor, i.e. dV/drho_tor [m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: area
field.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface [m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: aprime
field.documentation: Radial derivative of the cross-sectional area of the flux surface with respect to psi, i.e. darea/dpsi [m^2/Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: surface
field.documentation: Surface area of the flux surface [m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: ftrap
field.documentation: Trapped particle fraction; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm1
field.documentation: average(1/R^2); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm2
field.documentation: average(grad_rho^2/R^2); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm3
field.documentation: average(grad_rho^2); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm4
field.documentation: average(1/B^2) [T^-2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm5
field.documentation: average(B^2) [T^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm6
field.documentation: average(grad_rho^2/B^2) [T^-2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm7
field.documentation: average(grad_rho); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm8
field.documentation: average(R); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: gm9
field.documentation: average(1/R); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: b_av
field.documentation: average(B); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: b_min
field.documentation: minimum(B) on the flux surface; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: b_max
field.documentation: maximum(B) on the flux surface; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: omega
field.documentation: Toroidal rotation angular frequency (assumed constant on the flux surface) [rad/s]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: omegaprime
field.documentation: Psi derivative of the toroidal rotation angular frequency (assumed constant on the flux surface) [rad/(s.Wb)]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: mach_a
field.documentation: Alfvenic Mach number; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: phi_flow
field.documentation: Poloidal flow function phi_flow = rho*v_pol/B_pol[kg/(V.s^2)] where rho is mass density; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: s_flow
field.documentation: Flux function in the closure equation p=S(psi).rho^(gamma); Entropy (gamma=5/3) or Temperature (gamma=1); Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: h_flow
field.documentation: flow function h_flow = gamma/(gamma-1)*s_flow*rho^(gamma-1) + 0.5*(phi_flow*B/rho)^2 - 0.5*(R*omega)^2 [m^2/s^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_mass
field.documentation: Mass density [kg/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: profiles_2d
field.documentation: Output profiles in the poloidal plane. Time-dependent

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types. 1-rectangular (R,Z) grid, in this case the position arrays should not be filled since they are redundant with grid/dim1 and dim2.

field.name: grid
field.documentation: definition of the 2D grid

field.name: dim1
field.documentation: First dimension values; Time-dependent; Vector (ndim1)

field.name: dim2
field.documentation: Second dimension values; Time-dependent; Vector (ndim2)

field.name: connect
field.documentation: In case of a finite elemnt representation, lists the points (3 for triangles, 4 for quadrangles) which define a finite element. In this case, ndim1=ndim2 and the value of grid_connect represents the index of the points in the list 1:ndim. E.g. : grid_connect(i,1:4) is a list of four integers [k1 k2 k3 k4] meaning that finite element #i is defined by the points (dim1(k1),dim2(k1)),(dim1(k2),dim2(k2)),(dim1(k3),dim2(k3)) and (dim1(k4),dim2(k4)); Time-dependent; Matrix of integers (nelement,4)

field.name: r
field.documentation: values of the major radius on the grid [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: z
field.documentation: values of the altitude on the grid [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: values of the poloidal flux at the grid in the poloidal plane [Wb]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: values of the poloidal angle on the grid [rad]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal flux [Wb]. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: jphi
field.documentation: toroidal plasma current density [A m-2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: jpar
field.documentation: parallel (to magnetic field) plasma current density [A m-2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: br
field.documentation: R component of the poloidal magnetic field at the specified grid [T]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: bz
field.documentation: Z component of the poloidal magnetic field at the specified grid [T]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: bphi
field.documentation: toroidal component of the magnetic field at the specified grid [T]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: vphi
field.documentation: toroidal flow velocity [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: vtheta
field.documentation: Poloidal flow velocity [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: rho_mass
field.documentation: Mass density [kg/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: pressure
field.documentation: Pressure [Pa]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: temperature
field.documentation: Temperature [eV]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: coord_sys
field.documentation: flux surface coordinate system on a square grid of flux and angle

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Type of coordinate system

field.name: grid
field.documentation: Regular grid definition; Time-dependent

field.name: dim1
field.documentation: First dimension values; Vector (ndim1)

field.name: dim2
field.documentation: Second dimension values; Vector (ndim2)

field.name: jacobian
field.documentation: Jacobian of the coordinate system; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_11
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_11; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_12
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_12; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_13
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_13; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_22
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_22; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_23
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_23; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_33
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_33; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: position
field.documentation: R and Z position of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

CPO.documentation: Fusion product diagnostics; Time-dependent CPO

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: fus_product
field.documentation: Source. Time-dependent. Structure array. Replicate this source structure to accommodate neutron and gammas.

field.name: product
field.documentation: Type of fusion product (neutron,gamma)

field.name: reaction
field.documentation: Type of reaction involved (e.g. DD neutron, Be-alpha,n,gamma-C)

field.name: collimator
field.documentation: Collimator array.

field.name: colli_circ
field.documentation: Geometry of each channel of detector for circular cross section. Replicate this structure for each channel.

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name tag for the chord.

field.name: setup_line
field.documentation: Geometric description of the line of sight. First pivot close to detector position and second pivot at first wall hit.

field.name: pivot_point
field.documentation: Pivot point of each line of sight; Vector (nchords)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang1
field.documentation: Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang1
field.documentation: Angle of chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: width
field.documentation: Width of the laser beam (1/e) [m]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: second_point
field.documentation: Second point defining the line of sight together with the pivot_point. In case the probing wave is reflected, this should be the position of the mirror. This data is redundant with horchordang1 and verchordang1. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of reflected l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle of reflected chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: third_point
field.documentation: Third point defining the reflected line of sight together with the second_point (undefined if the probing wave is not reflected). This data is redundant with horchordang2 and verchordang2. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: nchordpoints
field.documentation: Number of points along the viewing chords (used for synthetic diagnostic signal reconstruction)

field.name: colliunit
field.documentation: Detail of each collimator unit of each chord. Replicate this structure for each collimator.

field.name: radius
field.documentation: Radius of cross section; Typically dim=2 for just entry and exit of collimator; Vector (dim)

field.name: centre
field.documentation: Position of cross section centre; Typically dim=2 for just entry and exit of collimator; Vector (dim)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: colli_poly
field.documentation: Geometry of each channel of detector for polygon cross section. Replicate this structure for each channel.

field.documentation: Angle of chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: width
field.documentation: Width of the laser beam (1/e) [m]; Vector (nchords)

field.documentation: Second point defining the line of sight together with the pivot_point. In case the probing wave is reflected, this should be the position of the mirror. This data is redundant with horchordang1 and verchordang1. Vector (nchords).

field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of reflected l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle of reflected chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: third_point
field.documentation: Third point defining the reflected line of sight together with the second_point (undefined if the probing wave is not reflected). This data is redundant with horchordang2 and verchordang2. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: nchordpoints
field.documentation: Number of points along the viewing chords (used for synthetic diagnostic signal reconstruction)

field.name: colliunit
field.documentation: Detail of each collimator unit of each chord. Replicate this structure for each collimator.

field.name: dimension
field.documentation: Number of edges of cross section.

field.name: nodes
field.documentation: Coordinates of nodes defining each cross section; Typically dim=2 for just entry and exit of collimator; Vector (dim,nnodes)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: colli_3d
field.documentation: Geometry of each channel of detector for arbitrary cross section. Replicate this structure for each channel.

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name tag for the chord. String.

field.name: voxels
field.documentation: Array of voxel structures defining the plasma region viewed from each collimator and scaling factor for effective solid angle for sources.

field.name: centre
field.documentation: Centre of voxel; used also as origin of direction to detector

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: volume
field.documentation: Voxel Volume

field.name: solid_angle
field.documentation: effective solid angle (divided by 4pi) of the voxel towards detector.

field.name: counts
field.documentation: Integrated emissivity [s^-1].

field.name: units
field.documentation: Energy units (ev, tof - time of flight)

field.documentation: Integrated emissivity for all spatial chords. Replicate the structure for each energy bin [s^-1]. Time-dependent

field.name: detect_ct
field.documentation: Detected integrated emissivity for each chord as function of energy like variable. Replicate this structure for each chord. This structure contains the actual experimental data as obtained from the detector. To get from species emissivity to the detector counts a detector tranfer matrix is used (should be shot independent) since a monoenergetic beam will ultimately show up with a given spread in the detector channels. Each detector type or l.o.s. might have a dedicated detctor transfer matrix since the energy discrimination can vary. [s^-1]. Time-dependent

field.name: transf_mat
field.documentation: Transfer matrix of the detector. Each l.o.s. might have a dedicated detector response function and energy resolution (and number of cells). Time-independent. Matrix (ncells,nenergy)

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name, Vector of strings (nantenna)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Wave type (LH, EC, IC, ...), Vector of strings (nantenna)

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Wave frequency [Hz], Vector (nantenna).

field.name: mode
field.documentation: Incoming wave mode (+ 1 : slow wave only; -1 both slow and fast wave modes). Vector of integers (nantenna). Time-dependent

field.name: position
field.documentation: Reference global position of the antenna. Time-dependent

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: spectrum
field.documentation: Spectral properties of the wave.

field.name: phi_theta
field.documentation: Power spectrum as a function of the refractive index in the toroidal and poloidal directions.

field.name: nn_phi
field.documentation: Number of points for the discretization of the spectrum in the toroidal direction, Vector of integers (nantenna).

field.name: nn_theta
field.documentation: Number of points for the discretization of the spectrum in the poloidal direction, Vector of integers (nantenna).

field.name: n_phi
field.documentation: Refraction index in the toroidal direction, Matrix (nantenna,max_nn_phi).

field.name: n_theta
field.documentation: Refraction index in poloidal direction, Matrix (nantenna,max_nn_theta).

field.name: power
field.documentation: W/dNphi/dNtheta [W], Array (nantenna, max_nn_phi, max_nn_theta). Time-dependent

field.name: parallel
field.documentation: Power spectrum as a function of the parallel refractive index.

field.name: nn_par
field.documentation: Number of points for the discretization of the spectrum in the poloidal direction, Vector of integers (nantenna).

field.name: n_par
field.documentation: Refraction index in the parallel direction, Matrix (nantenna,max_nn_par).

field.name: power
field.documentation: W/dN_par [W], Matrix(nantenna, max_nn_par). Time-dependent

field.name: beam
field.documentation: Beam characteristics

field.name: spot
field.documentation: Spot characteristics

field.name: waist
field.documentation: Waist for the spot ellipse [m], Matrix (nantenna,2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the spot ellipse [rd], Vector(nantenna). Time-dependent

field.name: phaseellipse
field.documentation: Phase ellipse characteristics of the spot

field.name: invcurvrad
field.documentation: Inverse curvature radii for the phase ellipse [m-1], Matrix (nantenna,2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the phase ellipse [rd], Vector(nantenna). Time-dependent

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field, redundant with the toroidfield CPO, to document the normalisation of rho and j in this CPO.

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Scalar. Time-dependent.

field.name: n
field.documentation: Vector of toroidal mode numbers; Structure Array (ntor); Time-dependent

field.name: modenum
field.documentation: Toroidal mode number of the MHD mode; Scalar; Time-dependent.

field.name: growthrate
field.documentation: Linear growthrate of the mode [Hz]; Scalar; Time-dependent.

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Frequency of the mode [Hz]; Scalar; Time-dependent.

field.name: plasma
field.documentation: MHD modes in the confined plasma

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Position in poloidal flux [Wb] (without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi). Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised, equivalent to rho_tor_norm) [m]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: m
field.documentation: Poloidal mode number; Time-dependent; Array2D (npsi,nm)

field.name: disp_perp
field.documentation: Perpendicular displacement of the mode (in Fourier space) [m]; Time-dependent; Array 2D (npsi,nm)

field.name: disp_par
field.documentation: Parallel displacement of the mode (in Fourier space) [m]; Time-dependent; Array 2D (npsi,nm)

field.name: tau_alfven
field.documentation: Alven time=R/vA=R0 sqrt(mi ni(rho))/B0 [s]; Definitions of R0, BO, mi, ni to be clarified. rho grid should be included in the MHD CPO ? Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: tau_res
field.documentation: Resistive time = mu_0 rho*rho/1.22/eta_neo [s]; Source of eta_neo to be clarified. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: coord_sys
field.documentation: flux surface coordinate system on a square grid of flux and angle

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Type of coordinate system

field.name: grid
field.documentation: Regular grid definition; Time-dependent

field.name: dim1
field.documentation: First dimension values; Vector (ndim1)

field.name: dim2
field.documentation: Second dimension values; Vector (ndim2)

field.name: jacobian
field.documentation: Jacobian of the coordinate system; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_11
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_11; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_12
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_12; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_13
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_13; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_22
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_22; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_23
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_23; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: g_33
field.documentation: metric coefficients g_33; g_ij=g^ij are contravariant metric tensor for the grid described by grid_type. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: position
field.documentation: R and Z position of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: polarimetry
field.documentation: This structure accomodates the polarimetry setup and measurements of a mse diagnostic, as widely used in fusion devices. The final measurement is the tan(gamma) where gamma is the polarization angle of a particular spectral mse component.

field.name: setup
field.documentation: diagnostic setup information

field.name: rzgamma
field.documentation: Position and width of the intersection between beam and line of sight. Vectors (nchords)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Position : major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Position : altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Position : toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: dr
field.documentation: Width : major radius [m]

field.name: dz
field.documentation: Width : altitude [m]

field.name: dphi
field.documentation: Width : toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: geom_coef
field.documentation: Geometric coefficients (9) describing the angle between beam and line of sight; The first dimension contains succesively : numerator, coefficients of BZ, BR, Bphi, ER; denominator, coefficients of BZ, BR, Bphi, ER, EZ; Matrix (9,nchords). In versions of the data structure before 4.08, there were only 6 coefficients namely : numerator, coefficients of BZ, BR, Bphi; denominator, coefficients of BZ, BR, Bphi.

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measured value (MSE angle gamma [rad]). Time-dependent; Vector (nchords)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: spectral
field.documentation: This structure accommodates the types needed on a spectral MSE diagnostic namely the emmissivity and the radiance spectra. It will be subsequenty upgraded with optical + photon detection elements since the structure will also be used for a synthetic spectral mse code.

field.name: emissivity
field.documentation: Emissivity characteristics.

field.name: wavelength
field.documentation: Wavelength [m]. Vector (nwavelength)

field.name: emiss_chord
field.documentation: MSE Emissivity characterization. This structure is used for each line of sight of the MSE setup and contains the geometry of the line of sight, the emissivity(wavelength,pos) for each polarization state along the line of sight, the quantization axis and the emission volume. Replicate the structure for each line of sight. Time-dependent

field.name: volume
field.documentation: Emitting volume (m^-3). Scalar

field.name: setup
field.documentation: Description of the line of sight (for the moment a line - not a cone of sight). Vector (npos).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: polarization
field.documentation: Polarized and unpolarized emissivity of the relevant MSE spectral lines. Structure Array (ncomp). Time-dependent.

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the polarization. 0 for unpolarised, 1 for Pi, 2 for sigma^+ and 3 for sigma^-

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: spec_emiss
field.documentation: Spectral emissivity of a particular polarization (Wm^-3sr-^1). Matrix (npos,nwavelength). Time-dependent

field.name: quantiaxis
field.documentation: Quantization axis for the line of sight (eR,ePhi,eZ). It is a unitary vector associated to the line of sight and to the emissivity, e.g. the Lorentzian electric field direction); Vector (3). Time-dependent

field.name: radiance
field.documentation: Emissivity characteristics.

field.name: wavelength
field.documentation: Wavelength [m]. Vector (nwavelength)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: radia_chord
field.documentation: MSE radiance characterization. This structure is used for each line of sight of the MSE setup and contains the geometry of the line of sight, the radiance(wavelength) for each polarization state, the quantization axis. Replicate the structure for each line of sight. Time-dependent

field.name: setup
field.documentation: Geometry for the observation line of sight

field.name: pivot_point
field.documentation: Pivot point of mse line of sight. Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang
field.documentation: Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of mse line of sight with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS trajectory - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Scalar

field.name: verchordang
field.documentation: Angle of mse line of sight with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top trajectory, Pi for top-bottom trajectory - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Scalar

field.name: second_point
field.documentation: Second point defining the mse line of sight together with the pivot_point. Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: stokes
field.documentation: Stokes vector (I,U,S,V) as a function of the wavelength for the polarized and unpolarized relevant MSE spectral lines. Replicate for each spectral component. Structure array (ncomp). Time-dependent.

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the polarization. 0 for unpolarised, 1 for Pi, 2 for sigma^+ and 3 for sigma^-

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Stokes vector (I,U,S,V) as a function of the wavelength. Vector (4,nwavelength).

field.name: totradiance
field.documentation: Total Radiance integrated along the lines of sight (Wm^-2sr-^1). Vector (nwavelength)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: nbi_unit
field.documentation: Vector of Neutral Beam Injector units. The NBI system should be separated in to the individually power strucutres. Structure array(nunits). Time-dependent

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name of the neutral beam injector

field.name: inj_spec
field.documentation: Injected species

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge

field.name: pow_unit
field.documentation: Power delivered by an NBI unit [W]; Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: inj_eng_unit
field.documentation: Full injection energy of a unit [ev]; Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: beamcurrfrac
field.documentation: Beam current fractions; beamcurrfrac(j) is the fraction of the beam current from beam neutrals with the j:th harmonic energy, inj_eng_unit. Vector(3); Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: beampowrfrac
field.documentation: Beam power fractions; beampowrfrac(j) is the fraction of the beam power from beam neutrals with the j:th harmonic energy, inj_eng_unit;. Vector(3); Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: beamletgroup
field.documentation: Group of beamlets with common vertical and horizontal focal point. If there are no common focal points, then select small groups of beamlets such that a focal point description of the beamlet-group provides a fair description.

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position of centre of injection unit surface (or grounded grid).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: tang_rad
field.documentation: Tangency radius (major radius where the central line of a NBI unit is tangent to a circle around the torus) [m]

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Angle of inclination between a line at the centre of the injection unit surface and the horiontal plane [rad]

field.name: direction
field.documentation: Direction of the beam seen from above the torus: -1 = clockwise; 1 = counter clockwise

field.name: width_horiz
field.documentation: Horizontal width of the beam group at the injection unit surface (or grounded grid) [m]

field.name: width_vert
field.documentation: Vertical width of the beam group at the injection unit surface (or grounded grid) [m]

field.name: focussing
field.documentation: Describes how the beam is focussed.

field.name: focal_len_hz
field.documentation: Horizontal focal length along the beam line, i.e. the point along the centre of the beamlet-group where the beamlet-group has its minimum horizontal width [m]. Scalar

field.name: focal_len_vc
field.documentation: Vertical focal length along the beam line, i.e. the point along the centre of the beamlet-group where the beamlet-group has its minimum vertical width [m]. Scalar

field.name: width_min_hz
field.documentation: The horizontal width of the beamlet-group at the at the horizontal focal point [m]. Scalar

field.name: width_min_vc
field.documentation: The vertical width of the beamlet-group at the at the vertical focal point [m]. Scalar

field.name: divergence
field.documentation: Detailed information on beamlet divergence. Divergens is described as a super position of Gaussian profiles with amplitide "frac_divcomp" and vertical/horizontal divergence "div_vert"/"div_horiz". Note that for positive ion NBI the divergence is well described by a single Gaussian.

field.name: frac_divcomp
field.documentation: Fraction of injected particles. Vector(ndiv_comp)

field.name: div_vert
field.documentation: The vertical beamlet divergence [rad]. Here the divergence is defined for Gaussian beams as the angel where the beam density is reduced by a factor 1/e compared to the maximum density. For non-Gaussian beams the divergence is sqrt(2)*mean((x-mean(x))**2), where x is the angle and the mean should be performed over the beam density, P(x): mean(y)=int(y*P(x)*dx). Vector(ndiv_comp)

field.name: div_horiz
field.documentation: The horizontal beamlet divergence [rad]. Here the divergence is defined for Gaussian beams as the angel where the beam density is reduced by a factor 1/e compared to the maximum density. For non-Gaussian beams the divergence is sqrt(2)*mean((x-mean(x))**2), where x is the angle and the mean should be performed over the beam density, P(x): mean(y)=int(y*P(x)*dx). Vector(ndiv_comp)

field.name: beamlets
field.documentation: Detailed information on beamlets.

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position of beamlets. Vector rzphi1D (nbeamlets)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: tang_rad_blt
field.documentation: Tangency radius (major radius where the central line of a beamlet is tangent to a circle around the torus) [m]; Vector(nbeamlets)

field.name: angle_blt
field.documentation: Angle of inclination between a line at the centre of a beamlet and the horiontal plane [rad]; Vector(nbeamlets)

field.name: pow_frc_blt
field.documentation: Fraction of power of a unit injected by a beamlet; Vector(nbeamlets)

field.name: wall
field.documentation: Description of the wall components in the NBI system that limits the beam spatial width of the beam. The wall is here described a superposition of surface segments and collimating holes.

field.name: surface
field.documentation: A collimating solid surface described by a polygon; no particle can pass through this surface

field.name: triangle
field.documentation: Triangular wall surface described by its three corners: point1, point2, and point3. Vector(n_triangles)

field.name: point1
field.documentation: Point 1 on the triangle

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: point2
field.documentation: Point 2 on the triangle

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: point3
field.documentation: Point 3 on the triangle

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: rectangle
field.documentation: Rectangular wall surface described by its four corners. These form an ordered sequence: point00, point01, point11, point10. Here the first point should be calculated from the other three as point00=point01+poin10-point11. Vector(n_rectangles)

field.name: point01
field.documentation: Point 01 on the rectangle

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: point11
field.documentation: Point 11 on the rectangle

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: point10
field.documentation: Point 10 on the rectangle

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: collimator
field.documentation: Vector of collimating holes (openings). Each hole has to be flat, i.e. it lies on a surface. Particles can only cross this surface by passing through the hole. To describe the hole we first construct a coordinate system on the surface by defining the original and two basis vectors in (x,y,z) space. The polyon is then represented as the origin, plus a linear combination of the two basis vectors using coord1 and coord2. As an example, a rectangle with two of the corners given by "origin+basis1" and "origin+basis2" can be described using coord1=[1,0,-1,0] and coord2=[0,1,0,-1].

field.name: origin
field.documentation: Origin of the surface coordinate system.

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: basis1
field.documentation: First basis vector on the surface.

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: basis2
field.documentation: First basis vector on the surface.

field.name: x
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate x [m]

field.name: y
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate y [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Spatial coordinate z [m]

field.name: coord1
field.documentation: First coordinate of the polygon points, conjugate to basis1.

field.name: coord2
field.documentation: Second coordinate of the polygon points, conjugate to basis2.

field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: mode
field.documentation: List of the various NTM modes appearing during the simulation. If a mode appears several times, use several indices in this arra of structure with the same m,n values. All descendant nodes are marked as Time-dependent for technical reasons, to allow the size of the mode AoS to vary.

field.name: onset
field.documentation: NTM onset characteristics. Time-dependent

field.name: w
field.documentation: Seed island full width [m]. Time-dependent.

field.name: time_onset
field.documentation: Onset time [s]. Time-dependent.

field.name: time_offset
field.documentation: Offset time [s] (when a mode disappears). If the mode reappears later in the simulation, use another index of the mode array of structure. Time-dependent.

field.name: phase
field.documentation: Phase of the mode at onset [rad]. Time-dependent.

field.name: n
field.documentation: Toroidal mode number. Time-dependent.

field.name: m
field.documentation: Poloidal mode number. Time-dependent.

field.name: description
field.documentation: Cause of the mode onset. Time-dependent.

field.name: full_evol
field.documentation: Detailed NTM evolution on a finer timebase than the CPO timebase. Time-dependent.

field.name: time_evol
field.documentation: Time array used to describe the detailed mode evolution which can be different from the CPO timebase [s]. Vector(ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: w
field.documentation: Full width of the mode [m]. Vector(ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: dwdt
field.documentation: Time derivative of the full width of the mode [m/s]. Vector(ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: phase
field.documentation: Phase of the mode [rad]. Vector(ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: dphasedt
field.documentation: Time-derivative of the phase of the mode [rad]. Vector(ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Frequency of the mode [Hz]. Vector(ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: dfrequencydt
field.documentation: time derivative of the frequency of the mode [Hz]. Vector(ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: island
field.documentation: Island description

field.name: geometry
field.documentation: Description of island geometry [?]. Matrix(nradial, ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: coord_values
field.documentation: Radial coordinate values [?]. Matrix(nradial, ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: coord_desc
field.documentation: Description of flux label, use the same for all islands. Time-dependent.

field.name: n
field.documentation: Toroidal mode number. Time-dependent.

field.name: m
field.documentation: Poloidal mode number. Time-dependent.

field.name: deltaw_value
field.documentation: Matrix(ntype, ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: deltaw_name
field.documentation: Name of the deltaw contribution. String vector (ntype). Time-dependent.

field.name: torque_value
field.documentation: Matrix(ntype_torque, ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: torque_name
field.documentation: Name of the torque contribution. String vector (ntype_torque). Time-dependent.

field.name: delta_diff
field.documentation: Extra diffusion coefficient for Te, ne, Ti equation. Matrix(nequation, ntime_evol). Time-dependent.

field.name: description
field.documentation: How the mode evolution is calculated. Time-dependent.

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: [m]. Vector(ntime_evol) Time-dependent.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Vector (nrho)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised, equivalent to rho_tor_norm) [m]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Plasma composition (description of ion species). OBSOLESCENT.

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label for the ions - note the charge state is not included; String Vector (nion)

field.name: desc_impur
field.documentation: Description of the impurities (list of ion species and possibly different charge states). OBSOLESCENT.

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number of the impurity; Vector (nimp)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge of the impurity; Vector (nimp)

field.name: i_ion
field.documentation: Index of the impurity species in the coreprof ion species ordering. Vector (nimp)

field.name: nzimp
field.documentation: Number of charge states (or bundles) considered for each impurity species. Vector (nimp)

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. Matrix (nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. If no bundle, zmax=zmin. Matrix (nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label for the impurities - note that the charge state is not included; String Vector (nimp)

field.name: compositions
field.documentation: Contains all the composition information for the simulation (main ions, impurities, neutrals, edge species).

field.name: nuclei
field.documentation: Array of nuclei considered.

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge [units of elementary charge];

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Mass of atom [amu]

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying element (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

field.name: ions
field.documentation: Array of main plasma ions.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

field.name: impurities
field.documentation: Array of impurities.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: i_ion
field.documentation: Index of the impurity species in the ions array of structures. Vector (nimp)

field.name: nzimp
field.documentation: Number of charge states (or bundles) considered for this impurity species.

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. If no bundle, zmax=zmin. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String array (nzimp) identifying impurities (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)

field.name: neutralscomp
field.documentation: Array of neutrals.

field.name: neutcomp
field.documentation: Array of components to the atom or molecule. Vector (ncomp)

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: multiplicity
field.documentation: Multiplicity of the atom; int

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of neutral, in terms of energy : 0=cold, 1=thermal, 2= fast, 3=NBI. Vector (ntype) of identifiers

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the atom or molecule (e.g. D2, DT, CD4, ...)

field.name: edgespecies
field.documentation: Array of edge species.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. D0, D+, C0, C+, C+2, ...)

field.name: signature
field.documentation: Identifier for species choices. The goal of this is to uniquely capture the species blocks so that if the signatures are the same then the species blocks will also be the same.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: ni_neo
field.documentation: Neoclassical transport coefficients for ion density equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: diff_eff
field.documentation: Effective diffusivity [m^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: vconv_eff
field.documentation: Effective convection [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: exchange
field.documentation: Ion to electron energy exchange [W.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Matrix(nrho,nion).

field.name: qgi
field.documentation: Energy exchange term due to transport. [W.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: flux
field.unit: field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself
field.documentation: Flux. Not used in transport equations [field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: off_diagonal
field.documentation: Details of the transport matrix, just for diagnostic (not used in transport equations). Time-dependent.

field.name: d_ni
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,nion)

field.name: d_ti
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,nion)

field.name: d_ne
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_te
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron temperature gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_epar
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling parallel electric field to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_mtor
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling total toroidal momentum to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing the form of transport produced by the original model : 0- not calculated, 1- D and V, 2- flux, 3- full transport matrix. Scalar.

field.name: diff_eff
field.documentation: Effective diffusivity [m^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: vconv_eff
field.documentation: Effective convection [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: flux
field.unit: field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself
field.documentation: Flux. Not used in transport equations [field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: off_diagonal
field.documentation: Details of the transport matrix, just for diagnostic (not used in transport equations). Time-dependent.

field.name: d_ni
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_ti
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_ne
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: d_te
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron temperature gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: d_epar
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling parallel electric field to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: d_mtor
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling total toroidal momentum to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing the form of transport produced by the original model : 0- not calculated, 1- D and V, 2- flux, 3- full transport matrix. Scalar.

field.name: tz_neo
field.documentation: Neoclassical transport coefficients for impurity (multiple charge state) temperature equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: diff_eff
field.documentation: Effective diffusivity [m^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array2d (nrho,nzimp)

field.name: vconv_eff
field.documentation: Effective convection [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array2d (nrho,nzimp)

field.name: exchange
field.documentation: Ion to electron energy exchange [W.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Array2d (nrho,nzimp)

field.name: flux
field.unit: field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself
field.documentation: Flux. Not used in transport equations [field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself]. Time-dependent. Array2d (nrho,nzimp)

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing the form of transport produced by the original model : 0- not calculated, 1- D and V, 2- flux, 3- full transport matrix (off-diagonal subtree not available for impurities for the moment). Scalar.

field.name: mtor_neo
field.documentation: Neoclassical transport coefficients for total toroidal momentum equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: diff_eff
field.documentation: Effective diffusivity [m^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: vconv_eff
field.documentation: Effective convection [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: flux
field.unit: field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself
field.documentation: Flux. Not used in transport equations [field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: off_diagonal
field.documentation: Details of the transport matrix, just for diagnostic (not used in transport equations). Time-dependent.

field.name: d_ni
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_ti
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_ne
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: d_te
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron temperature gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: d_epar
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling parallel electric field to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: d_mtor
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling total toroidal momentum to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing the form of transport produced by the original model : 0- not calculated, 1- D and V, 2- flux, 3- full transport matrix. Scalar.

field.name: sigma
field.documentation: Neoclassical conductivity [ohm^-1.m^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: jboot
field.documentation: Bootstrap current density [A.m^-2]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: er
field.documentation: Radial electric field [V/m]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: vpol
field.documentation: Neoclassical poloidal rotation of each ion species [m/s]. Time-dependent. Matrix(nrho,nion).

field.name: vtor
field.documentation: Neoclassical toroidal rotation of each ion species [m/s]. Time-dependent. Matrix(nrho,nion).

field.name: mach
field.documentation: Mach number of each ion species. Time-dependent. Matrix(nrho,nion).

field.name: utheta_e
field.documentation: Electron poloidal flow [m/s]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: utheta_i
field.documentation: Ion poloidal flow [m/s]. Time-dependent. Matrix(nrho,nion).

field.name: viscosity_par
field.documentation: Ion parallel viscosity [?]. Time-dependent. Matrix(nrho,nion).

field.name: impurity
field.documentation: Array(nimp). Time-dependent

field.name: utheta_z
field.documentation: Ion poloidal flow for various charge states [m/s]. Time-dependent. Matrix(nrho,nzimp).

field.name: fext
field.documentation: Moments of parallel external force on each ion species [T.J.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Array3D(nrho,nion,nmoment).

field.name: jext
field.documentation: Current density response to fext [A.m^-2]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar.

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

CPO.documentation: Orbits for a set of particles. Time-dependent CPO

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: com
field.documentation: COM (Constants Of Motion) parameters identifying an orbit

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass of the particle; Scalar

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Atomic charge of the particle; Scalar

field.name: energy
field.documentation: Energy of the particle [keV]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: magn_mom
field.documentation: Magnetic momentum [kg m^2 / s^2 / T]; Time-dependent, Vector(norbits).

field.name: p_phi
field.documentation: toroidal angular momentum [kg m^2 / s]; Time-dependent; Vector(norbits);

field.name: sigma
field.documentation: Sign of parallel velocity at psi=psi_max along the orbit; Time-dependent; Vector(norbits)

field.name: trace
field.documentation: Position of particle in 5D space (3D in real and 2D in velocity).

field.name: time_orb
field.documentation: Time along the orbit [s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb)

field.name: ntorb
field.documentation: Number of time slices along the orbit, for each orbit. Time-dependent; Vector (norbits)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius of the guiding centre [m], Major radius; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude of the guiding centre [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle of the guiding centre [rad]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Guiding centre position in psi [normalised poloidal flux]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb)).

field.name: theta_b
field.documentation: Position of the guiding centre in poloidal Boozer angle [rad]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: v_parallel
field.documentation: Parallel velocity along the orbit [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: v_perp
field.documentation: Perpendicular velocity along the orbit [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: global_param
field.documentation: Global quantities associated with an orbit.

field.name: orbit_type
field.documentation: Identifier of orbit type: 0 trapped, -1 co-passing, + 1 counter-passing ; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits)

field.name: omega_b
field.documentation: Bounce angular frequency rad/s; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits)

field.name: omega_phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angular precession frequency [rad/s]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: omega_c_av
field.documentation: Orbit averaged cyclotron frequency [rad/a]; Time-dependent; Vector(norbits).

field.name: special_pos
field.documentation: Special positions along an orbit (like turning points).

field.name: midplane
field.documentation: Intersections with the midplane

field.name: outer
field.documentation: Position at outer mid-plane

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Position in psi [normalised poloidal flux]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: theta_b
field.documentation: Poloidal Boozer angle [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: inner
field.documentation: Position at inner mid-plane

field.documentation: Major radius [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.documentation: Location of turning points

field.documentation: Position at upper turning point

field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.documentation: Shot number

field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method
