field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data for implicit objects

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id flag). A flag defining how the geometry data associated with grid objects is to be interpreted. If the field is undefined (0=GRID_UNDEFINED), the standard interpretation for; the given coordinate types is assumed.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id string).

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: geo_matrix
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with implicit objects. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on); The exact definition of the stored values depends on the geometry type of the geometry complexgrid_geo_global.geotype;

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of object, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects) in this geometry. [m^dim].; Use this field to store measures of implicitly defined grid objects.; Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: bases
field.documentation: Vector bases. Used for aligned vector representation. Time-dependent (added systematically for the COMP child inheritance of that property). Array of structures (number of bases)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this vector quantity is associated with.

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label describing the data

field.name: comp
field.documentation: Components of the vector. Array of structures (number of vector components). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: align
field.documentation: Alignment flag for vector components. Integer vector (number of vector components).

field.name: alignid
field.documentation: Alignment id for vector components. String vector (number of vector components).

field.name: basis
field.documentation: Index of basis (defined in associated grid) this vector is aligned to; If set to GRID_UNDEFINED=0, the canonical basis of the default coordinates of the grid assumed.

field.name: plasma
field.documentation: Description of incoming plasma for every wall component. Array of structures (number of wall components). The geometry of the wall component with index i is given by the corresponding subgrid with index i in wall/wall3d/grid. Time-dependent

field.name: species
field.documentation: Definition of plasma species. Index into wall/compositions/edgespecies. Integer vector (number of plasma species).

field.name: flux
field.documentation: Plasma particle flux density from/to plasma facing wall surfaces [1/(m^2 s)]. Positive means incoming onto the wall, negative means sent back into the plasma. Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of plasma species, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: b
field.documentation: Magnetic field vector at the surface [T]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of space dimensions, number of discretization elements in the subgrid). If two-dimensional: unit vectors with first coordinate perpendicular to the wall facing towards the plasma, second coordinate parallel to the surface (in the direction of the surface discretization), third dimension is zero. If three-dimensional: vector is relative to basis vectors stored in wall/wall3d/grid/basis with basis index as given in wall/wall3d/basis_index.

field.name: energy
field.documentation: Total energy flux density of incoming particles of given species [W/m^2]; Positive means incoming onto the wall, negative means sent back into the plasma. Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of plasma species, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: wall_state
field.documentation: Dynamic wall state of every wall component. Array of structures (number of wall components). The geometry of the wall component with index i is given by the corresponding subgrid with index i in wall/wall3d/grid. Time-dependent

field.name: wall_type
field.documentation: Definition of reference wall composition for every subgrid of the wall discretization. Vector of integers (number of subgrids). The indices point to wall/wall_types.

field.name: n_depo_layer
field.documentation: Number of deposited layers (in addition to the engineering layers)

field.name: layers
field.documentation: Data on wall element layers; Array of structures (number of engineering layers + number of deposited layers); Layers can possibly be void (e.g. completely eroded), which is indicated by zero thickness. Time-dependent

field.name: elements
field.documentation: List of elements present in the solid phase in this layer. Vector (number of elements). Holds indices pointing to wall/elements

field.name: gases
field.documentation: List of gases present in this layer. Vector (number of gases). Holds indices pointing to wall/elements

field.name: compounds
field.documentation: List of compounds present in the solid phase in this layer. Vector (number of compounds). Holds indices pointing to wall/compounds

field.name: density
field.documentation: Discretized density distribution in the layer of the discrete wall elements in the subgrid [kg/m^3]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: dx
field.documentation: Size of the vertical cells in the layer of the discrete wall elements in the subgrid [kg/m^3]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: thickness
field.documentation: Total size of the layer [m] (i.e. sum of dx over the number of vertical cells in the layer); Time-dependent; Vector (number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: roughness
field.documentation: Interface roughness description between the discrete elements and their top neighbour (i.e. towards the plasma); Time-dependent; Float 3d array (number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid, index of roughness parameter); Roughness parameter 1: RMS height [m], parameter 2: wavelength along projection of B on the surface [m], parameter 3: wavelength perpendicular to projection of B on the surface [m]. If only two parameters are given the parameters are assumed to be isotropic

field.name: porosity
field.documentation: Discrete description of porosity of the layer. Time-dependent; Float 3d array (number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid, index of porosity parameter); Porosity parameter 1: Volume fraction occupied by the pores [-], parameter 2: average size of the pores [m]

field.name: dpa
field.documentation: Discretized number of displacements per atom in the layer of the discrete wall elements in the subgrid [-]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: temperature
field.documentation: Discretized temperature distribution in the layer of the discrete wall elements in the subgrid [eV]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: element_frac
field.documentation: Fractional abundance of elements in the layer of the discrete wall elements in the subgrid [-]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of chemical elements as given in (local) elements, number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: chem_comp
field.documentation: Fractional abundance of chemical compounds in the layer of the discrete wall elements in the subgrid [-]; Time-dependent; Float matrix (number of chemical compounds as given in (local) compounds, number of vertical cells in layer, number of discretization elements in the subgrid)

field.name: bulk_D
field.documentation: Diffusivity of gas species in bulks of different compounds [m^2/s]; Time-dependent; 4d float array. Dimensions: 1. index of compound (indexing as in (local) compounds), 2. index of gas element (indexing as in (local) gases), 3. cell index of 1d layer height discretization, 4. number of discretization elements in the subgrid

field.name: surface_D
field.documentation: Diffusivity of hydrogen species of surface of different compounds [m^2/s]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: bulk_solute
field.documentation: Bulk mobile (solute) concentration [atoms/m^3]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: surf_solute
field.documentation: Surface mobile (solute) concentration [atoms/m^2]; Time-dependent; Dimensions: see bulk_D

field.name: pore_content
field.documentation: Amount of gas species trapped in pores per cubic meter [1/m^3]; Time-dependent; 3d float array. Dimensions: 1. index of gas element (indexing as in (local) gases), 2. cell index of 1d layer height discretization, 3. number of discretization element in the subgrid

field.name: trap_type
field.documentation: Definition of trap types. Array of structures (number of trap types)

field.name: trap_id
field.documentation: Identifier for the trap type

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: compound
field.documentation: Index of the compound doing the trapping. Refers to (local) ../compounds.

field.name: gas_species
field.documentation: Index of the gas species being trapped. Refers to (local) ../gases.

field.name: energy
field.documentation: Energy depth of the trap [eV]

field.name: fill_factor
field.documentation: Discretized filling fraction of traps in this layer (0...1) [-]. Dimensions: 1. index: cell index of depth discretization in this layer; 2. index: number of discretization elements in the subgrid

field.name: density
field.documentation: Discretized density of traps in this layer [1/m^3]. Dimensions: 1. index: cell index of depth discretization in this layer; 2. index: number of discretization elements in the subgrid

field.name: eta
field.documentation: Resitivity of wall element described by grid geometry [Ohm.m]

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: permeability
field.documentation: Relative permeability of wall element described by grid geometry [-]

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: j
field.documentation: Current density vector in the element specified by the grid representation. [A/m^2]

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this vector quantity is associated with.

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label describing the data

field.name: comp
field.documentation: Components of the vector. Array of structures (number of vector components). Time-dependent; FIXME: inherit time-dependence for this element

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.name: align
field.documentation: Alignment flag for vector components. Integer vector (number of vector components).

field.name: alignid
field.documentation: Alignment id for vector components. String vector (number of vector components).

field.name: basis
field.documentation: Index of basis (defined in associated grid) this vector is aligned to; If set to GRID_UNDEFINED=0, the canonical basis of the default coordinates of the grid assumed.

field.name: basis_index
field.documentation: Index of basis vectors in wall/wall3d/grid/basis used to define vector quantities e.g. in plasma.

field.name: wall_types
field.documentation: List of reference wall types (e.g. bulk tungsten, tungsten-coated CFC, ...) ; Array of structures (number of reference wall types)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label for this reference wall type

field.name: layers
field.documentation: Engineering layers composing the wall element; array of structures (number of engineering layers). First layer is facing the plasma, increasing index means moving away from the plasma facing surface

field.name: thickness
field.documentation: Thickness of layer [m]

field.name: chem_comp
field.documentation: Chemical composition of the layer in terms of the chemical compounds defined in wall/design_comp/compounds. Vector of fractional concentrations.

field.name: compounds
field.documentation: Chemical compounds (e.g. solid tungsten, WC, CFC, ...) possibly present in the wall. Array of structure (number of compounds)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Compound name/label

field.name: stochiometry
field.documentation: Fractional composition of the compound. Float vector, dimensions: 1. element number (numbering as in wall/elements array)

field.name: density
field.documentation: Compound density (molecules/m^3)

field.name: heat_cap
field.documentation: Specific heat capacity [J/(eV kg)]

field.name: heat_cond
field.documentation: Thermal conductivity [W/(m eV)]

field.name: surf_recrate
field.documentation: Recombination rate on surface (only for pure elements, not compounds) [molecules*m^2/s]; Dimensions: index 1: first recombining element, index 2: second recombining element (numbering as in wall/elements array)

field.name: elements
field.documentation: Chemical elements present in the wall units, including elements from the plasma (gas + impurities). Use by compounds. Array of structures (number of elements)

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei in wall/compositions/nuclei if the element is present there. Otherwise it is 0 and zn, amn and label have to be set.

field.name: label
field.documentation: Element name/label

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge [units of elementary charge];

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Mass of atom [amu]

field.name: nuclei
field.documentation: Array of nuclei considered.

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge [units of elementary charge];

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Mass of atom [amu]

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying element (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

field.name: ions
field.documentation: Array of main plasma ions.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

field.name: impurities
field.documentation: Array of impurities.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: i_ion
field.documentation: Index of the impurity species in the ions array of structures. Vector (nimp)

field.name: nzimp
field.documentation: Number of charge states (or bundles) considered for this impurity species.

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. If no bundle, zmax=zmin. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String array (nzimp) identifying impurities (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)

field.name: neutralscomp
field.documentation: Array of neutrals.

field.name: neutcomp
field.documentation: Array of components to the atom or molecule. Vector (ncomp)

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: multiplicity
field.documentation: Multiplicity of the atom; int

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of neutral, in terms of energy : 0=cold, 1=thermal, 2= fast, 3=NBI. Vector (ntype) of identifiers

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the atom or molecule (e.g. D2, DT, CD4, ...)

field.name: edgespecies
field.documentation: Array of edge species.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. D0, D+, C0, C+, C+2, ...)

field.name: signature
field.documentation: Identifier for species choices. The goal of this is to uniquely capture the species blocks so that if the signatures are the same then the species blocks will also be the same.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar.

CPO.documentation: RF wave propagation and deposition. Time-dependent CPO

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: cocos
field.documentation: COordinates COnventionS followed by this CPO

field.name: id
field.documentation: CPO id for checking its provenance in the workflow

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: coherentwave
field.documentation: Wave description for each frequency. Time-dependent. Structure array(nfreq)

field.name: wave_id
field.documentation: List of identifiers for the coherent-wave, in terms of the type and name of the antenna driving the wave and an index separating waves driven by the same antenna. Possible types: EC/LH/IC (see waves_types in the Documentation website under Conventions/Enumerated_datatypes); the field name should include the name of the antenna as specified in either antennas(*)%ec_antenna%name, antennas(*)%ic_antenna%name, or antennas(*)%lh_antenna%name; the field index should separate different waves generated from a single antenna.

field.name: type
field.documentation: Identify the type of the object or process.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: name
field.documentation: The name of the object or process. Here the object should be an instans of the type specified in the field type.

field.name: index
field.documentation: Index the separating objects or processes with the same name.

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Plasma composition (description of ion species). OBSOLESCENT.

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: Label for the ions - note the charge state is not included; String Vector (nion)

field.name: compositions
field.documentation: Contains detailed information on the plasma composition (main ions, impurities, neutrals, edge species).

field.name: nuclei
field.documentation: Array of nuclei considered.

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge [units of elementary charge];

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Mass of atom [amu]

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying element (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

field.name: ions
field.documentation: Array of main plasma ions.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)

field.name: impurities
field.documentation: Array of impurities.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: i_ion
field.documentation: Index of the impurity species in the ions array of structures. Vector (nimp)

field.name: nzimp
field.documentation: Number of charge states (or bundles) considered for this impurity species.

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. If no bundle, zmax=zmin. Vector (nzimp)

field.name: label
field.documentation: String array (nzimp) identifying impurities (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)

field.name: neutralscomp
field.documentation: Array of neutrals.

field.name: neutcomp
field.documentation: Array of components to the atom or molecule. Vector (ncomp)

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: multiplicity
field.documentation: Multiplicity of the atom; int

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of neutral, in terms of energy : 0=cold, 1=thermal, 2= fast, 3=NBI. Vector (ntype) of identifiers

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the atom or molecule (e.g. D2, DT, CD4, ...)

field.name: edgespecies
field.documentation: Array of edge species.

field.name: nucindex
field.documentation: Index into list of nuclei; int

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of species charge state bundle

field.name: label
field.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. D0, D+, C0, C+, C+2, ...)

field.name: signature
field.documentation: Identifier for species choices. The goal of this is to uniquely capture the species blocks so that if the signatures are the same then the species blocks will also be the same.

field.name: id
field.documentation: Short string identifier

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Integer identifier

field.name: description
field.documentation: Verbose description of identifier

field.name: global_param
field.documentation: Global wave deposition parameters

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name, String

field.name: type
field.documentation: Wave type (LH, EC, IC, ...), String

field.name: f_assumption
field.documentation: Assumption on the functions distribution used by the wave solver to calculate the power deposition : 0 = Maxwellian (linear absorption); 1 = quasi-linear (F given by a distribution function CPO). Integer vector (nion+1). The first value corresponds to the electrons, then to the other ion species. Time-dependent.

field.name: code_type
field.documentation: Type of wave deposition code for a given frequency: 1=beam/ray tracing; 2=full wave; Integer

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Wave frequency [Hz]; Time-dependent, floating

field.name: ntor
field.documentation: Toroidal mode numbers; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: power_tot
field.documentation: Total absorbed wave power [W]; Time-dependent

field.name: p_frac_ntor
field.documentation: Fraction of wave power per toroidal mode number; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: pow_e
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the thermal electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Float

field.name: pow_i
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the thermal ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (nion)

field.name: pow_z
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the thermal impurity species [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: pow_fe
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the fast electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Float

field.name: pow_fi
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the fast ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (nion)

field.name: pow_fz
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the fast impurity species [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: pow_ntor_e
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the thermal electrons for each toroidal mode [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_i
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an the thermal ion species for each toroidal mode [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ntor, nion)

field.name: pow_ntor_z
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an the thermal impurity species for each toroidal mode [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: pow_ntor_fe
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the fast electrons for each toroidal mode [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_fi
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an the fast ion species for each toroidal mode [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ntor, nion)

field.name: pow_ntor_fz
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an the fast impurity species for each toroidal mode [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: cur_tor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent, Float

field.name: cur_tor_ntor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current for each toroidal mode number from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: mag_axis
field.documentation: Position of the magnetic axis. Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used to define the rho_tor coordinate and the normalisation of parallel current densities).

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Scalar. Time-dependent.

field.name: grid_1d
field.documentation: Grid points for 1D profiles.

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate [m]. Defined as sqrt((phi-phi_axis)/pi/B0), where B0=../global_param/toroid_field/b0, phi is the toroidal flux and phi_axis is the toroidal flux at the magnetic axis. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: The toroidal flux coordinate normalised to be zero at the axis and unity at the last closed flux surface, or last available fluxsurface if the last closed flux surface is not defined. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal flux function [Wb], evaluated without 1/2pi, such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: volume
field.documentation: Volume enclosed by the flux surface [m^3]. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: area
field.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface [m^2]. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: grid_2d
field.documentation: Grid points for 2D profiles and for full wave solutions.

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Grid type. 1: rectangular grid in (R,Z). 2: rectangular grid in (psi, theta). 3: unstructured grid. Integer.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: The toroidal flux coordinate normalised to be zero at the axis and unity at the last closed flux surface (or last available fluxsurface from a fix boundary equilibrium code). Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate [m]. Defined as sqrt((phi-phi_axis)/pi/B0), where B0=../global_param/toroid_field/b0, phi is the toroidal flux and phi_axis is the toroidal flux at the magnetic axis. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Grid points in poloidal flux function [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: Poloidal angle at the grid points (see theta_info for detailed definition); Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: r
field.documentation: R (major radius) of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix(ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: z
field.documentation: Z (altitude) of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta_info
field.documentation: Information on the poloidal angle theta.

field.name: angl_type
field.documentation: Type of poloidal angle: 1 : same as the poloidal angle in the equlibrium cpo; 2 : geometrical polar angle, tan(theta) = Z/(R-R_0); 3 : other. If option 3, a transformation to the geometrical poloidal angle is provided in th2th_pol.

field.name: th2th_pol
field.documentation: Geometrical poloidal angle at grid points in theta, i.e. the transformation from theta to the polar poloidal angle; used only if angl_type=3; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: profiles_1d
field.documentation: 1D radial profiles

field.name: powd_tot
field.documentation: Total flux surface averaged wave power density [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: powd_e
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on the thermal electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: powd_i
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on the thermal ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: powd_z
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on the thermal impurities species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: powd_fe
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on the fast electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: powd_fi
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on the fast ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: powd_fz
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on the fast impurities species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: powd_ntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density for each toroidal mode number [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix(npsi, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_e
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density absorbed for each toroidal mode number on the thermal electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_i
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density absorbed for each toroidal mode number on each thermal ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor_z
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density absorbed for each toroidal mode number on each thermal impurity species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: powd_ntor_fe
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density absorbed for each toroidal mode number on the fast electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_fi
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density absorbed for each toroidal mode number on each fast ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor_fz
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density absorbed for each toroidal mode number on each fast impurity species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: curd_tor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven toroidal current density = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: curd_torntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven toroidal current density for each toroidal mode number = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_tot
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power density [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pow_e
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power on the thermal electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pow_i
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power on the thermal ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: pow_z
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power on the thermal impurities species [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: pow_fe
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power on the fast electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pow_fi
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power on the fast ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: pow_fz
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power on the fast impurities species [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: pow_ntor
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power for each toroidal mode number [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_e
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power for each toroidal mode number on the thermal electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_i
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power for each toroidal mode number on each thermal ions species [W]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: pow_ntor_z
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power for each toroidal mode number on each thermal impurity species [W]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: pow_ntor_fe
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power for each toroidal mode number on the fast electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_fi
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power for each toroidal mode number on each fast ions species [W]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: pow_ntor_fz
field.documentation: Cumulative volume integral of the absorbed wave power for each toroidal mode number on each fast impurity species [W]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: curd_par
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven parallel current density = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 = global_param/toroid_field/b0; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: curd_parntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven parallel current density for each toroidal mode number = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 = global_param/toroid_field/b0; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: cur_tor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current inside a flux surface [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: cur_tor_ntor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current inside a flux surface for each toroidal mode number [A]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: e_plus_ave
field.documentation: The left hand polarised electric field component, E_plus [V/m], averaged over the flux surface, where the averaged is weighted with the power depotition, P, such that e_plus_ave = ave( E_plus P ) / ave( P ), where ave(*) is the flux surface average operator; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: e_minus_ave
field.documentation: The right hand polarised electric field component, E_minus [V/m], averaged over the flux surface, where the averaged is weighted with the power depotition, P, such that e_minus_ave = ave( E_minus P ) / ave( P ), where (*) is the flux surface average operator; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: e_para_ave
field.documentation: The parallel electric field component, E_para [V/m], averaged over the flux surface, where the averaged is weighted with the power depotition, P, such that e_para_ave = ave( E_para P ) / ave( P ), where ave(*) is the flux surface average operator; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: k_perp_ave
field.documentation: The perpendicular wave number, k_perp [1/m], averaged over the flux surface, where the averaged is weighted with the power depotition, P, such that k_perp_ave = ave( k_perp P ) / ( P ), where ave(*) is the flux surface average operator; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: profiles_2d
field.documentation: 2D profiles in poloidal cross-section

field.name: powd_tot
field.documentation: Total wave power density; Time-dependent [W/m^3]; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: powd_e
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on the thermal electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: powd_i
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on each thermal ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (ndim1, ndim2, nion)

field.name: powd_z
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on each thermal impurity species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (ndim1, ndim2, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: powd_fe
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on the fast electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: powd_fi
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on each fast ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (ndim1, ndim2, nion)

field.name: powd_fz
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on each fast impurity species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (ndim1, ndim2, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: powd_ntor
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_e
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on the thermal electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_i
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on each thermal ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array4D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor_z
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on each thermal impurity species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array4D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: powd_ntor_fe
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on the fast electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_fi
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on each fast ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array4D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor_fz
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on each fast impurity species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array4D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nimpur, nzimp)

field.name: powd_iharm
field.documentation: Power density absorbed by an ion species for each toroidal mode numer at a given harmonic cyclotron resonance ; Time-dependent (W/m^3); Array5D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nion, nharm)

field.name: beamtracing
field.documentation: Beam-tracing or ray-tracing solver. Vector(nbeams). Time-dependent

field.name: npoints
field.documentation: Number of points along each ray/beam. Integer

field.name: power
field.documentation: Initial power in each ray/beam [W]. Float. Time-dependent

field.name: dnpar
field.documentation: Spectral width in refractive index associated with each ray/beam, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: length
field.documentation: Ray/beam curvilinear length [m], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: position
field.documentation: Ray/beam position

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius location [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: z
field.documentation: Vertical location [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle location [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux coordinate [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: Poloidal angle location [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints). PRECISE THE DEFINITION OF THE POLOIDAL ANGLE, SEE WAVES/COHERENTWAVE(:)/GRID_2D.

field.name: wavevector
field.documentation: Ray/beam wave vector.

field.name: kr
field.documentation: Wave vector in the major radius direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: kz
field.documentation: Wave vector in the vertical direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: kphi
field.documentation: Wave vector in the toroidal direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: npar
field.documentation: Parallel refractive index, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: nperp
field.documentation: Perpendicular refractive index, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: ntor
field.documentation: Toroidal wave number, Vector (npoints/1). If var_ntor=0, ntor is constant along the ray path and the last dimension is of size 1 in order to avoid useless repetition of ntor constant value. Time-dependent

field.name: var_ntor
field.documentation: Flag telling whether ntor is constant along the ray path (0) or varying (1). Integer

field.name: polarization
field.documentation: Wave field polarization along the ray/beam.

field.name: epol_p_re
field.documentation: Real part of the left hand polarized electric field (rotating with the ions), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_p_im
field.documentation: Imaginary part of the left hand polarized electric field (rotating with the ions), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_m_re
field.documentation: Real part of the right hand polarized electric field (rotating with the electrons), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_m_im
field.documentation: Real part of the right hand polarized electric field (rotating with the electrons), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_par_re
field.documentation: Real part of the electric field polarization vector in the magnetic field direction, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_par_im
field.documentation: Imaginary part of the electric field polarization vector in the magnetic field direction, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: powerflow
field.documentation: Power flow along the ray/beam.

field.name: phi_perp
field.documentation: Normalized power flow in the direction perpendicular to the magnetic field; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: phi_par
field.documentation: Normalized power flow in the direction parallel to the magnetic field; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: power_e
field.documentation: Power absorbed along the beam by electrons [W]; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: power_i
field.documentation: Power absorbed along the beam by an ion species [W]; Matrix (npoints, nion). Time-dependent

field.name: fullwave
field.documentation: Solution by full wave code

field.name: grid
field.documentation: Grid for storing the components of the wave field; Time-dependent

field.name: uid
field.documentation: Unique index of this grid. Used for handling multiple grids

field.name: id
field.documentation: Name / identifier string for this grid

field.name: spaces
field.documentation: Definitions of grid spaces. Array of structures (number of spaces)

field.name: geotype
field.documentation: Type of space geometry (id flags). Flags defining how the geometry (objects.geo) fields associated with; space objects are to be interpreted. Array (number of geometries defined for this space),; first dimension: geometry index. A flag value of GRID_UNDEFINED=0 indicates the standard interpretation for; the given coordinates.

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of space geometries (id string). See geotype.

field.name: coordtype
field.documentation: Type of coordinates describing the physical space. Vector (number of space dimensions); The size of coordtype defines the dimension of the space.; For predefined integer constants for standard coordinates see; the documentation of the grid service library.

field.name: objects
field.documentation: Definition of the space objects.; Array of structures (dimension of highest-dimensional objects).; First dimension: dimension of the objects (1=nodes, 2=edges, 3=faces, 4=cells/volumes, ...)

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Lists of (n-1)-dimensional space objects defining the boundary of an n-dimensional space object.; Matrix(number of objects of dimension n, maximum number of boundary objects).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary object index

field.name: neighbour
field.documentation: Connectivity information. Array (number of objects, maximum number of boundaries per object, maximum number of neighbours per boundary).; Stores the indices of the n-dimensional objects adjacent to the given n-dimensional object.;An object can possibly have multiple neighbours on every boundary.; First dimension: object index, second dimension: boundary index, third dimension: neighbour index on the boundary.

field.name: geo
field.documentation: Geometry data matrix associated with every object. Float array (number of objects, number of geometry coeff. 1, number of geometry coeff. 2, number of geometries).; The exact definition depends on the geometry type of the space (complexgrid_space.geotype).; First dimension: object index, second+third dimension: geometry coefficient matrix row+column, third dimension: geometry index (for definition of multiple geometries).

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of space objects, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects,...). [m^dim].; First dimension: object index, second dimension: geometry index

field.name: xpoints
field.documentation: List of indices of all nodes which are x-points. Vector (number of x-points)

field.name: subgrids
field.documentation: Definitions of subgrids. Array of structures (number of subgrids)

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID string (name) of the subgrid.

field.name: list
field.documentation: List of object lists. Array of structures (number of object lists).

field.name: cls
field.documentation: Class tuple of the grid objects in this object list. Vector (number of grid spaces)

field.name: indset
field.documentation: Implicit list of the object indices.; Array of structures (number of grid spaces = length of index tuple). Every index of the index tuple is described by an index set, which defines either a list of index values or a range of index values.

field.name: range
field.documentation: Defines an index range enumerating from range[1] to range[2] (with both range[1] and range[2] included). If additionally a third value range(3) is given, it is used as a stride. If it is omitted, a stride of 1 is assumed. Vector(3)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: An explicit list of indices. If this member is defined and has nonzero size, the list is assumed to be explicit. Vector(length of explicit index list)

field.name: ind
field.documentation: Explicit list of index tuples. Matrix (number of objects, number of spaces in grid).; First dimension: object index, second dimension: index tuple/space index.; If this field is defined and has nonzero size, the object list is understood to be explicit.

field.name: metric
field.documentation: Metric coefficients

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measure of object, i.e. physical size (length for 1d, area for 2d, volume for 3d objects). [m^dim].; Use this field to store measures of implicitly defined grid objects.; Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: griduid
field.documentation: Unique identifier of the grid this scalar quantity is associated with.

field.name: subgrid
field.documentation: Index of the subgrid (as stored in grid.subgrids) the data is stored on.

field.name: scalar
field.documentation: Scalar representation of data. One scalar entry is stored per object in the subgrid.; The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float Vector(nobjects_subgrid). First dimension: object index.

field.name: vector
field.documentation: Vector representation of data. One vector is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; Float matrix(nobjects_subgrid, ndata).First dimension: object index, second dimension: index of data vector.

field.name: matrix
field.documentation: Matrix representation of data. One matrix is stored per object in the subgrid. The order is implicitly defined by the subgrid.; 3d float array(nobjects_subgrid,ndata1,ndata2). First dimension: object index, second dimension: matrix row, third dimension: matrix column.

field.documentation: Metric coefficients g11. Array of structures (number of subgrids this information is stored on)

field.name: geotypeid
field.documentation: Type of geometry (id string).

field.name: coordtype

field.name: geo_matrix

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.
